text: «hizibochemi hoyi! berisu (betelakihubeti madiresi) layi genizebini alit’eyik’achihumi፡፡ minidaye be’alahi layi iniji belela layi ayidelemi፡፡ inemi ineziyani yamenutini abarari ayidelehumi፡፡ inerisu getachewini yemigenanyu nachewina፡፡ gini inemi yemitisasatu hizibochi honachihu ayachihwalehu፡፡»
